content: I've already made the switch to reusable cloths, and I'm loving the reduction in paper towel waste. I invested in a set of reusable cloths about a month ago, and they've been a game-changer. I've been using them to clean up spills and wipe down surfaces, and they can be washed and reused multiple times. I've already seen a significant decrease in my paper towel usage, and I'm hoping to eliminate them entirely soon.
